screen.screenshot_viewer.no_config: In-game configuration is not supported. Consider installing the 'Configured' mod.
screen.screenshot_viewer.delete_prompt.m: 你确定要删除此屏幕截图吗?
screen.screenshot_viewer.delete_n_screen: Are you sure you want to delete these screenshots ? (they will be lost forever!)
screen.screenshot_viewer.rename_screensh: 为屏幕截图设置新名称:
tooltip.screenshot_viewer.redirect_to_sc: Open screenshot in the Screenshot Manager...
tooltip.screenshot_viewer.menu_hint:
Right-click to manage 
Hit CTRL-C to copy to clipboard
config.screenshot_viewer.show_button_in_: 在暂停页面显示一个直接查看屏幕截图的按钮.
config.screenshot_viewer.show_button_on_: 在标题页面显示一个直接查看屏幕截图的按钮.
config.screenshot_viewer.enable_screensh: 启用屏幕截图放大动画
设置是否在查看屏幕截图播放放大动画.
config.screenshot_viewer.prompt_when_del: 在删除截图时显示提示
在尝试删除截图文件时通过确认页面显示警告.
config.screenshot_viewer.initial_screens: 每行默认屏幕截图数量
设置打开屏幕截图浏览页面时默认每行显示的屏幕截图数量(值应为 2 ~ 8).
config.screenshot_viewer.screen_scroll_s: 设置页面的滑动速度(值应为 1 ~ 50).
config.screenshot_viewer.screenshot_elem: 屏幕截图组件背景透明度
设置屏幕截图悬浮显示时背景的透明度(值应为 0 ~ 100).
config.screenshot_viewer.render_screensh: 渲染屏幕截图组件字体阴影
设置是否在屏幕截图组件文字下方渲染阴影.
config.screenshot_viewer.screenshot_elem: 屏幕截图组件字体颜色
设置屏幕截图组件的颜色.
config.screenshot_viewer.default_list_or: 默认屏幕截图排序方式
设置打开浏览页面时屏幕截图的默认排序方式.
config.screenshot_viewer.pause_menu_butt: The offset in pixels of the screenshot manager button if shown in the pause menu (from 0 to how much you want).
config.screenshot_viewer.screenshots_fol: The path to the folder containing the screenshots images that will be displayed in the screen.
config.screenshot_viewer.redirect_screen: If enabled, clicking on the link printed in the chat when taking a screenshot will open it directly in the screenshot manager.
config.screenshot_viewer.screenshot_elem: The visibility state of the screenshots names.
config.screenshot_viewer.invert_zoom_dir: If enabled, it inverts the scroll direction during zoom in the Screenshot Viewer menu
config.screenshot_viewer.display_hint_to: Controls whether a tooltip giving useful info should appear when hovering a screenshot for a prolonged period.
config.screenshot_viewer.render_wide_pro: Whether the properties buttons should be rendered wide or square.
